com.github.wuic.nut.filter.setter

Class RegexExpressionsPropertySetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.config.PropertySetter<String[]>
      • com.github.wuic.nut.filter.setter.RegexExpressionsPropertySetter

  • public class RegexExpressionsPropertySetter
extends PropertySetter<String[]>

    Setter for the ApplicationConfig.REGEX_EXPRESSIONS property.

    Uris array is specified as a String containing each value separated by a '\n' character.

    Since:
    0.4.5
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET
